title: 好多IT工呀! Fresh Grad都大量請! 唔啱都幫手Share下啦!

replies.msg:
Hello! 有幾間公司搵緊IT Candidates呀! 大家可以睇下自己 / Frds 有冇興趣

1. QA Analyst
- Manual
- Automation - Selenium
- 20-25k
- 尖沙咀 ( 9am - 6pm )


2. AVP, IT Infrastructure ( Network & Security ) - Investment Bank
- Design and Implement Infrastructure
- Information Security Projects
- IT Audit
- Vendors Management
- 40-50k ( Depends on Experience )
- 中環


3. DevOps Engineer
- CI/CD
- System Health Check
- Nginx
- 1yr+ Experience
- 20-25k


4. Frontend Developer ( Fresh Grads are Welcome! )
- JavaScript
- React
- Junior ( 17-23k )
- Senior ( 30-45k )


5. Backend Developer ( Fresh Grads are Welcome! )
- Java
- Spring Boot / Spring
- Junior ( 17-23k )
- Senior ( 30-45k )


6. Scrum Master
- Project Management
- Post Implementation
- Project Closure
- Follow Agreed Methodology


7. UX Designer
- 4+ Years Experience
- Research
- Wireframe / Mockup
- User Story


有興趣TG我 : http://t.me/Retrieve101
